name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Danger of the Ooze
name_original: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Danger of the Ooze
description:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Danger of the Ooze is an arcade game developed by WayForward Technologies. It came out on 28-10-2014. Activision Blizzard published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Danger of the Ooze is available on PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
It was directed by Tomm Hulett. Jake Kaufman scored the game.
